title: Unspecified Error
body: So i was in the middle of a Poro king game, and suddenly the entire game froze, it completely froze my computer and i had to do a hard restart on my comp. When i came back, this message appeared, and when i click continue and go launch, nothing happens the browser just closes. WTF is going on and how do i fix it???

replies.body: Ok so for some reason, Direct X uninstalled itself and i had to re install it, wtf is that?

Woah, that sounds terrifying. Spooky ghosts are haunting your control panel!

If I were you, honestly, I'd check every program and make sure the UAC is completely enabled. For something like a program uninstalling itself without your permission is a sign of your computer being infected with a virus.
